name: Paintball eXtreme
description:
Enter the world of paintball tournaments and challenge players from all around the world - you will tour Egypt, Russia, Canada, Poland and other countries. On 18 levels you'll discover special power-ups, such as bullet time, rapid fire, invisibility, triple fire, and you’ll use it on the battlefield to get the Cup. Paintball eXtreme is a fast-paced side-scrolling shooter with cartoony 2,5D graphics, that will keep you entertained for hours.

Game features:
  • 18 levels packed with enemies
  • 6 countries with different landscape and backgrounds
  • various power-ups to utilize against your enemies
  • fast-paced gameplay in a cartoony 2.5 D environments
  • capture the flag mode to extend gaming experience
